app_about:
This CTF competition is all about automating a tool to do things for you;hopefully with it you will learn a lot more Python, and feel a bit more powerful when you see how much scripting can really do for you.

The flags will change every minute, so your goal is to write some code that will retrieve the flag from a service and submit it for you, so there is no intervention by you as the user at all.

There are some serious modules I recommend to help you do this. This CTF is meant to be used as a way of learning, so please, don't be afraid to ask around how to do this kind of stuff -- in fact, that's what we want.

Good luck and have fun!

services.title: Flagger
services.description: Wow! This service just gives away a flag! What could be any easier than that?

services.title: D-CODE
services.description:
This service is really nice, too! It gives you the flag... but it's in some weird
				jumbled text!

services.title: ByteBot
services.description: Meet ByteBot! He'll give you a flag... byte by byte! Can you build the flag with his help?

services.title: BitBot
services.description:
It's ByteBot's older brother, BitBot! He's a lot like his brother, 
				just not as clear...

services.title: LampChamp 0
services.description: You've got to be the very best! Can you turn on all the lamps? It's not a hard thing to do!

services.title: Balloon Saloon
services.description:
It's a saloon... with a balloon! Not really. 
				But try and hit the target to get a flag!
